thread.title: H.S. girls tennis: Area doubles teams reach state
thread.title_full: H.S. girls tennis: Area doubles teams reach state

author: CantonRep.com staff report
title: H.S. girls tennis: Area doubles teams reach state
text: Posted Oct. 10, 2015 at 1:09 AM By CantonRep.com staff report Posted Oct. 10, 2015 at 1:09 AM OBERLIN Both Hoover and Green will send doubles teams to next week’s state tournament after each won two matches during Thursday’s Division I district tournament at Oberlin College. Hoover’s Lynn Daugherty and Sydney Bergman beat Hudson’s Andra Achim and Grace Graham 6-0, 6-1 in the first round and then followed that with a 6-2, 6-3 win over Westlake’s Leah Choban and Ashley Michelich in the second round. Green’s Anne Zivick and Maria Zivick beat Paige Carmichael and Caroline Dickinson of Walsh Jesuit 6-0, 6-3 in the first round and Molly Bauer and Tess Moran of Magnificat 6-2, 6-1 in the second round. Daugherty and Bergman will take on the Zivicks today at Tri-City Park in Rocky River in a semifinal match. All four will head to the state tournament next weekend at the Linder Family Tennis Center in Mason. In singles, Emily Thomas of Jackson won her first-round match, 6-3, 6-1 over Becca Biats of Lake Catholic and then fell to Emma Peeler of Westlake 6-0, 6-0 in the second round. Also in singles, Kayla Pukys of Louisville won her first-round match 6-2, 6-4 over Chardon’s Mary Kus before falling 6-1, 6-0 to Hudson’s Molly Sandberg. Both Thomas and Pukys move to the consolation bracket. With a win, each will earn one of six spots to the state tournament. Thomas faces Alexis Ratner of Solon, while Pukys plays Gabriella Costantini of Walsh Jesuit. Division II District at Springside Racquet and Fitness Club Singles First round Dunbar (Cloverleaf) d. Tall (Beachwood) 6-0, 6-0; Belot (Central Catholic) d. Stein (Lakeview) 6-3, 4-6, 7-6(4); Shulman (Hawken) d. Delatore (Poland) 6-0, 6-0; Lynch (Hathaway Brown) d. Sterling (Aquinas) 6-0, 6-0; Norman (CVCA) d. Sirpilla (Central Catholic) 6-0, 6-4; Althans (Gilmour) d. Kirela (Brookfield) 6-0, 6-0; Marlett (Warren JFK) d. Anderson (Central Catholic) 6-0, 6-0; Gillnov (Hathaway Brown) d. Varckette (Geneva) 6-1, 6-0. Second round Dunbar d. Belot 6-0, 6-0; Lynch d. Shulman 6-1, 6-7(4), 6-0; Althans d. Norman 6-1, 6-0; Gillinov d. Marlatt 6-0, 6-0. Semifinal pairings (starts today at 9 a.m.): Dunbar vs. Lynch; Althans d. Gillinov. Doubles First round Philippi-Mullins (Canton South) d. Zahuranec-Lee (NDCL) 6-3, 3-6, 6-0; Daverio-Wolf (Hathaway Brown) d. Paczak-Garvin (Lakeview) 6-1, 6-1; Ricciardi-Schweers (Poland) d. Shao-Khadilkar (Laurel) 6-1, 6-3; Stankovic-Tokman (Orange) d. Lehr-Dieringer 6-1, 6-1; Areklett-Persky (Hathaway Brown) d. Chittenden-Higgins (Triway) 6-0, 6-0; Stroup-Cole (Warren JFK) d. Gross-Jiano (Beachwood) 5-7, 6-4, 7-6(3); Nakamoto-Kashyap (Orange) d. Matthews-Francisco (Mooney) 6-1, 6-0; Hata-Desei (Laurel) d. A.Robinson-C.Robinson (Field) 6-2, 6-2. Page 2 of 2 - Second round Daverio-Wolf d. Philippi-Mullins 6-0, 7-5; Ricciardi-Schweers d. Stankovic-Tokman 6-3, 6-3; Areklett-Persky d. Stroup-Cole 6-3, 6-1; Nakamoto-Kashyap d. Hata-Desei 6-1, 6-3. Semifinal pairings (starts today at 9 a.m.): Daverio-Wolf vs. Ricciardi-Schweers; Areklett-Persky vs. Nakamoto-Kashyap. Division I District Singles First round Thomas (Jackson) d. Biats (Lake Catholic) 6-3, 6-1; Peeler (Westlake) d. Shane (Cuyahoga Falls) 6-1, 6-2; Ratner (Solon) d. Mawby (Hudson) 6-1, 6-3; Roggenburk (Magnificat) d. A.Koinolgou (Hoover) 6-2, 6-0; Vesikallio (Magnificat) d. Kas.Pukys (Perry) 6-0, 6-0; Costantini (Walsh Jesuit) d. Elisco (Howland) 6-3, 6-0; Sandberg (Hudson) d. Jhaveri (Westlake) 6-0, 6-0; Kay.Pukys (Louisville) d. Kus (Chardon) 6-2, 6-4. Second round Peeler d. Thomas 6-0, 6-0; Roggenburk d. Ratner 6-0, 6-0; Vesikallio d. Costantini 6-0, 6-2; Sandberg d. Kay.Pukys 6-1, 6-0. Today’s semifinal pairings Peeler vs. Roggenburk; Vesikallio vs. Sandberg. Fifth-place bracket Thomas vs. Ratner; Costantini vs. Kay.Pukys . Doubles First round Choban-Michelich (Westlake) d. Bush-Model (Kenston) 6-0, 6-1; Daugherty-Bergman (Hoover) d. Achim-Graham (Hudson) 6-1, 6-1; A.Zivick-M.Zivick (Green) d. Carmichael-Dickinson (Walsh Jesuit) 6-0, 6-3; Bauer-Moran (Magnificat) d. Doran-Stitts (Kenston) 6-1, 6-2; Cianciola-Kaleel (Canfield) d. Grierson-Sullivan (Rocky River) 6-2, 6-1; Harwood-Hissong (Walsh Jesuit) d. Kao-Cassell (Shaker) 6-1, 6-0; Rotenberg-Hsu (Mayfield) d. Jarolim-Elfers (Wadsworth) 6-3, 6-3; Nakon-Lopez (Avon) d. Hunt-Sutter (Hoover) 6-2, 6-3. Second round Daugherty-Bergman d. Choban-Michelich 6-2, 6-3; A.Zivick-M.Zivick d. Bauer-Moran 6-2, 6-1; Cianciola-Kaleel d. Harwood-Hissong 6-1, 6-1; Nakon-Lopez d. Rotenberg-Hsu 6-2, 6-3. Today’s semifinal pairings Daugherty-Bergman vs. A.Zivick-M.Zivick; Cianciola-Kaleel vs. Nakon-Lopez. Fifth-place bracket Choban-Michelich vs. Bauer-Moran; Harwood-Hissong vs. Rotenberg-Hsu. By CantonRep.com staff report
